title: looking for chill people
body: im a 43 year old guy who mains sup i do play other roles also but i am looking for a group off chill people im never toxic just so many toxic people in this game i want to find people who are chill and want to improve, im looking to plays norms/flex mostly add me on granpa or storms fury

replies.body: Hi I'm chill add me I'm TheMarvelousMole :)
